title: How has moral philosophy changed your behavior? - Quora

response.answer_text: Completely, because I have tried to live it, never veering from its guidance—flourishing, respecting the autonomy equality and and much more of everyone I encounter (or can reach to help) and trying to do good, spreading love. Sadly it also means fighting for justice, and I do mean fighting. That’s not something I’d choose if I could avoid it.

I would suggest in three key ways: Its helped me understand the importance of human dignity for understanding who we are and reflecting on ethical issues.Its helped me understand the limits of relativism.Its helped me understand the importance of virtue.
